availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ruben Curry (Caldwell Co., KY / Bedford Co. TN farmer )

body.p: Bedford County, Tennessee, and Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Frances Curry. Father of Sarah J. Curry, Susan Curry, Mary F. Curry, and James H. Curry. Farmer in Bedford County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Bedford County in 1860. Reported as a resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Bedford County, District 5, p.127A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Bedford County, District 4, p. 112.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 01, Caldwell County, Kentucky, 1863, p. 23.
"Ruben Curry (1811-1907)," Find A Grave, Memorial #98800032, accessed August 12, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/98800032.
